rules_text:
Whenever you sacrifice Koraja, exile it. Until the end of your next turn, you may cast it from exile.
When Koraja enters, if it wasn't cast from your hand, you may discard your hand. If you do, draw two cards.
flavor_text: [i]“I broke my sword over Aonuma's neck, yet he did not die. I will not fail again.”[/i]
